vote.title: Authorize an increase in the homestead property tax exemption for persons who are disabled or 65 or older from $115,500 to $139,400 beginning with the 2023 tax year (fiscal year beginning October 1, 2023) - Estimated Annual Revenue Foregone: General Fund ($9,245,184) and Debt Service Fund ($3,516,353) totaling ($12,761,537)
vote.description: Authorize an increase in the homestead property tax exemption for persons who are disabled or 65 or older from $115,500 to $139,400 beginning with the 2023 tax year (fiscal year beginning October 1, 2023) - Estimated Annual Revenue Foregone: General Fund ($9,245,184) and Debt Service Fund ($3,516,353) totaling ($12,761,537)
